Author: gretchenweinershair
Text: Thank you! Yes that’s actually sounds like good advice and I know if someone were taking medical leave I wouldn’t press for more info and just wish them well. That makes me feel better. I hope you get all the help you need as well!

Author: _Fr0gg0_
Text: Tell them you're taking medical leave. Dont go into detail and put a positive spin on how you're glad to get some medical help.  Or you could tell them you're taking medical leave for family reasons and leave it at that. Then if they press for questions you dont have share because you dont want to embarrass your "family member"
